name: automatic-md-translator
description: Automatic translation of Markdown-formatted files into the language of your choice using the [chatgpt-md-translator](https://github.com/smikitky/chatgpt-md-translator?tab=readme-ov-file) repository. The code creates a folder structure by language and generates translated copies of your ".md" files. This can be useful if you manage website content through these types of files.
